doc.field: Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 50 [Air date: 12/19/1997]
Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 50 [Air date: 12/19/1997]
COMMERCIAL: Homo Xtra (HX), "The one. The only. The original."
1. Andy Humm and Ann Northrop discuss recent general events that relate to the LGBT community.
2. Interview: Ed Sederbaum, activist and candidate for NYS Senate, discusses his running for office.
COMMERCIAL: CDC National AIDS Hotline, PSA for providing food for homebound people with AIDS

4. Footage from NY1 of gay veterans speaking at a NYC Council hearing regarding the military recruitment station in Times Square. Includes NY1 interview with Peter Vallone, City Council Speaker, regarding Tom Duane's efforts regarding the recruitment station.
6. Nora Burns discusses nightlife and entertainment-related events that relate to the LGBT community.

7. Interview: Christine Quinn, Executive Director of the Gay and Lesbian Anti-Violence Project, discusses a series of pick-up crimes in Miami committed by Damian Escobar and Roberto Ortiz, who may be headed to NY.
COMMERCIAL: Lesbian and Gay Public Awareness Project, tells the story of Bobby Griffith
Gay USA, Vol. XV, Episode No. 50 [Air date: 12/19/1997]: December 1997
